author: detroitnews.com
title: Detroit News college picks: Week 8
text:
Delton Williams picks up yardage during Michigan State's 56-17 win over Indiana last year in Bloomington. (Photo: Michael Hickey, Getty Images) 
1 CONNECT 1 TWEET LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE Matt Charboneau, Angelique S. Chengelis, John Niyo and Bob Wojnowski of The Detroit News offer their picks against the spread for Week 8 of the college season. 
Indiana +16.5 at Michigan State 
Charboneau: Michigan State
Chengelis: Michigan State
Niyo: Michigan State
Wojnowski: Indiana

Charboneau: Nebraska
Chengelis: Nebraska
Niyo: Nebraska
Wojnowski: Nebraska

Wojnowski: Penn State
